import React from 'react' import http, { request } from '../../utils/http'; import '../../utils/flexible' import './cart.scss' class Cart extends React.Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { // 推荐商品信息 goods: [], // 购物车商品信息 goodsList:[] } } // 请求数据 async componentDidMount() { // 获取购物车的信息 let list=await http.get('/db/carlist.json'); // if(list.code == "200"){ // console.log("购物车请求成功~~~~") // this.setState({ // goodsList: list.data // }) // } console.log(this.state.goodsList) // 获取推荐商品信息 let p = await http.get('/db/tuijian.json'); if (p.code == "200") { console.log("请求成功") this.setState({ goods: p.data }) } else { console.log("请求失败") } } render() { return (
